resources.string: Find music on the users device with the ContentResolver class
Store results in a custom array list with a little help from Cursor class and display them here using a List Adapter
Clicking one will play it and jump to NowPlaying activity to show details etc
Show information about the currently playing artist/band, maybe done by running a google search using the retrieved band name
Add \'Wake Lock\' permission to manifest so media can continue when device is idle
Add \'MusicService\' to manifest to enable playing media
Show information about the song currently playing, include ability to pause/play/rewind/forward etc
